website_summaries.verdict: If you're ready to get serious about agility training, this regulation size tunnel is quite the tool.
pros: Comes with stakes to hold it in place while your dog travels through the tunnel
So big, even a Great Dane can use it
Long enough to put a couple curves in it for a fun challenge
Can withstand the elements for a couple months (but is better when brought inside while not in use)
cons: Users reported issues with durability of the fabric, so it'll be worth monitoring to ensure nothing pokes through while your dog plays with it

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: I love this tunnel. My 150lb Great Dane actually fits without having to full army crawl.
customer_reviews.author: Trisa

customer_reviews.title: For the price I can’t complain
customer_reviews.text: This isn’t a true agility tunnel material wise but I knew that when I purchased it. I needed a starter tunnel for my two pups and something for them to do during our long, cold, and soggy winters. This tunnel works perfectly for that! We set it up down our hallway and run the pups through it. They have loads of fun! Tunnel will probably last me longer since I’m not using or leaving it set up outdoors. Folds up easily and love that it has the bag for storage. I just hang it in the hall closet.
customer_reviews.author: Lisa

customer_reviews.title: My 5 month old Havanese loves this
customer_reviews.text: This tunnel is well made. My pup LOVES it. One sad thing happened, however. He was racing at top speed around and around and got his paw caught. We were using it in hallway if our apartment and it was not secured, and slipped so his foot got caught under one of the metal ring. So we now tie it to something or hold it from both ends. It was heartbreaking to see him having so much fun then get hurt, so a word to the wise...
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: the reason for my 3 Star rating is because the metal comes through the ends VERY EASY, and after a short time I have to ...
customer_reviews.text: I have purchased probably 6 of these, the reason for my 3 Star rating is because the metal comes through the ends VERY EASY, and after a short time I have to discard it for fear that my dogs will get poked in a harmful way. If the material was just a little thicker this may not happen.
customer_reviews.author: JGriffith

customer_reviews.title: Great fun for Violet
customer_reviews.text: Pup loves the tunnel! Tried it inside first with great results. We have since been outdoors with it. She was going through it and quickly had toys in there. Soccer in the tunnel with a chew toy in her mouth. She loves to play with multiple toys at once so this adds another level of fun ad complexity. Seems sturdy enough and is easy to tie up and store.
customer_reviews.author: Brenda Ard

customer_reviews.title: Great size and quality for the price
customer_reviews.text: Great size and quality for the price. Only problem I have had is that once the tunnel has been opened and expanded it is almost impossible to get back into the carry bag it comes with. I can get it in the bag but zipping it without damaging the tunnel seems unlikely. Otherwise great fun for my dog and good size ( my dog is 60+ lbs and she has room enough to zip right through this).
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed
customer_reviews.text: I went from very satisfied to very disappointed. I have 2 10lb terriers who just loved this thing. However, after about 1 month the wires separated and were protruding through the outside of the fabric.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: A Dog and His Tunnel
customer_reviews.text: We have a 4 month old Golden and he loves to burrow behind couches-likes the enclosure. Problem is there are electrical wires back there and he's teething. Blocked the couches and got the tunnel-he loves it. Comes with stakes that go through metal grommets if used outdoors. So far we've only used it inside. Who knows, if we get into agility training he'll have a head start. Good socialization tool. Good value, fast shipping.
customer_reviews.author: junior1954

customer_reviews.title: Good tunnel for the price
customer_reviews.text: This agility tunnel is fine for home use but it is nowhere as durable as the one that are used in classes and competition events. We bought ours in January, 2019 and had it outside most of the time. It lasted about 10 months (in southern California), which is about as long as I expected. I have a 18 pound aussie-doodle that runs through it 5-10 times most every day. After about 8 months tears began to appear along the top and the hold-downs began to tear. I'm tossing it today but will order another one. Ten months of constant use is fine with me for the price.
customer_reviews.author: George A

customer_reviews.title: Awesome for the price!
customer_reviews.text: The professional agility tunnels are about $200, which is WAY out of my price range. With this tunnel a fraction of the cost, I wasn't expecting much. I am pleasantly surprised. I bought it for my little border collie pup. We've used it half a dozen times now and, so far, it's held up well. As others have mentioned, the spikes are pretty worthless. I might get some heavy traffic cones to hold it in place (that's what our puppy trainer uses when setting up her pro tunnel indoors) or I may consider sewing some makeshift saddle bags to drape around the open ends.
customer_reviews.author: SoCalMelissa

customer_reviews.title: Great for tunnel agility practice at home
customer_reviews.text: I got this to help teach my dog to go through a agility tunnel and practice in between his classes. It does the job. It comes in a portable carrying case and expands as soon as you unzip the case. It has held up well, but it does get dirty with dog foot prints. When placed back in its case, it takes up very little storage room.
customer_reviews.author: lkelly9988

customer_reviews.title: great
customer_reviews.text: The product itself is great. I had 1.5 years out in the yard with medium and small dogs. I bought again. They loved it, but I could not use the included securing stakes. Dogs running through and breeze pulled stakes right out . I live in Florida lots of loose soil but I'm pretty sure most other areas would have this problem to. I had to tie to porch columns. The stakes that secure it to ground should be at least 10" probably 12" instead of the 5 or 6" they are..
customer_reviews.author: Florida gk

customer_reviews.title: Great exercise and durable
customer_reviews.text: My one year old Rhodesian Ridgeback loves this tunnel. Great fun for her and play time with me. Plenty big and good length. I do not use the tie downs. One broke the first week. She is powerful and slightly missed the entrance running very fast. So, it broke. I easily compress it each night a place itin the shed.
customer_reviews.author: HistoryIsAwesome

customer_reviews.title: eh
customer_reviews.text: Pretty cheaply made but it's OKAY, I certainly wouldn't buy it again, though. I don't believe it's as sturdy as described - perhaps I should have just purchased a $20 kids play tunnel. We don't use it often because I'm afraid it will get more torn as it already has a small tear. Oh well, now I know. On a good note, the length is good and it is easy to fold up and store in its cary bag for on the go. Note: Used for our two dogs; 3 pound chihuahua and a very muscular, fast, and strong 12 pound chiweenie.
customer_reviews.author: MGTop Contributor: Pets

customer_reviews.title: Sparky Loves his tunnel!!
customer_reviews.text: I wasn't sure how my lab/border collie mix Sparky would do with this. Well, he simply loves it and we added some jumps and his POOL at the end and he thinks it's the most fun time he has had. I like the ease of putting it up and taking it down. It is absolutely the best time we have had together. Great product. It was delivered on time and was everything they said it would be. Thanks for this great tunnel.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Get better stakes
customer_reviews.text: It's sturdy from what I can tell. My 40 lb dog rips through it like there's squirrels on the other side. I leave it in the backyard 24/7 and we've had no tears so far. The stakes are flimsy however, and the tunnel frequently gets detached. Probably because my dog is a maniac and can't walk slowly.
customer_reviews.author: Stephanie W

customer_reviews.title: Fun game for backyard
customer_reviews.text: My dog enjoyed playing with the tunnel.It seems pretty durable however I did take it inside once it started to snow. You’ll have to buy some additional stakes to keep it in place otherwise your dog could get his paws caught between the plastic rings- if it is kept taught to ground it’s very stable.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Nice play tube.
customer_reviews.text: Metal stakes don’t hold the tube down. They pull out easily or unhook from the loops and get lost in the grass. Otherwise it’s a great play thing for the dogs. We adapted some plastic yard stakes that work much better.
customer_reviews.author: M116

customer_reviews.title: Great value and quality for a compact tunnel!
customer_reviews.text: Got this for our two 10lb. dogs. They love it and chase each other through it! Also, the grandkids will have fun in it when they visit. Well constructed with compact storage case. Looks easy to clean with hose. Our friend has a larger heavy duty one that takes up lots of room, but is better suited for the large dogs that she has. Tied orange ribbons on stakes, so they are easier to spot in grass.
customer_reviews.author: Mr. Fix-it

customer_reviews.title: Awesome Tunnel for Dog Agility
customer_reviews.text: I got this to train my King Charles Cavalier. She took to it IMMEDIATELY! It is her favorite agility course item and it is very well made. Very durable, easy to fold up, has a bag to throw it in. We just keep it up in our basement for her to run through.
customer_reviews.author: LittleTeacher

customer_reviews.title: Our 2 goldens love it.
customer_reviews.text: To say that our 2 goldens love this would literally be an understatement. They walk through it just to walk through and they use it in their play. It is beyond adorable!! It is very very durable to hold us to them running through it like fools. Folds up and is light to carry. It a winner in our book.
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer Glaser

customer_reviews.title: Decent product for the price.
customer_reviews.text: Good product for the money. It probably won't last to long, doesn't seem super durable and if dogs jump on it alot their nails may go through it. But my pups love it so well worth it. Definitely for small-medium dogs only, big dogs will not fit through the opening.
customer_reviews.author: D. Lyall

customer_reviews.title: My pets love it!
customer_reviews.text: This is by far one of the most interactive play toys I have bought my 2 cats and dog. They chase each other through the tunnel and the dog loves to have his favorite toys thrown down the tunnel so she can retrieve them. When they are finished for the day, I roll it up and tie it off.
customer_reviews.author: Sandy Bobbitt

customer_reviews.title: Great value, good quality, excellent for smaller dogs.
customer_reviews.text: Flexible, easy to use and shape, and perfect for smaller size dogs. We have a Havanese, and he has plenty of room getting into and running through this tunnel. Ground stakes allow the path you make to stay fixed while the dog runs through, and the entire tunnel folds easily into a carry bag. Great value for the price.
customer_reviews.author: M. Schlitt

customer_reviews.title: Fun addition to backyard
customer_reviews.text: I've been using this dog tunnel as a way to add some interest to the backyard for my two large dogs for almost a year now. They play with it every time I put it out, it's held up to their rough play and it's easy to fold up and store when I'm not using it or worried that it will blow away. highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: pvc

customer_reviews.title: ripped so can't use it till I repair, never came with the stakes...
customer_reviews.text: all the tags that you stake down to hold it down have all ripped off. so although my dog loved it, it is on to do list now. also it didn't come with any stakes so I had to buy them on my own because the seller never responded when it stated it would come with them. I have had it for maybe a month.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Fun exercise
customer_reviews.text: Got this for my 85# American Staffordshire Terrier. He really likes it and can fit through it. Still teaching him and working with it. Only issue for me is that I have "astroturf" with ground granite under it and can't get the stakes to go thru that. Have to figure out a way to anchor it or it rolls whenhe is in in. Wind also blows it around unstaked.
customer_reviews.author: HAVE4PAWS

customer_reviews.title: Dog loves it, great exercise equipment for our young dog
customer_reviews.text: Very lightweight but very durable. Dog uses it multiple times a day, running like crazy through it over and over again. Dog freaks out when she sees her tunnel roll around outside from the wind, but it does come with stakes that we now use. Easy to roll up and store in its own small bag.
customer_reviews.author: dkp

customer_reviews.title: Beagle loves it
customer_reviews.text: I have been working on agility training with our beagle. This was a great price. I keep it inside when it is not in use. The tunnel is very compact and quick to store.
customer_reviews.author: Dee

customer_reviews.title: I'm sure there are better ones out there.
customer_reviews.text: Not very durable and the stakes should be longer. A good stiff breeze and the stakes came up out of the ground. Used twice and it's already starting to tear. I have a 20 pound corgi and thought it would last longer than it has.
customer_reviews.author: Treadburners

customer_reviews.title: my German shepherd pup and pomeranian love it! They instantly took to it and were ...
customer_reviews.text: Bought this to give my dogs something to play with (while I'm around).... my German shepherd pup and pomeranian love it! They instantly took to it and were running in and out of it like crazy.... great quality comes with an awesome travel case... easy to fold up! Glad I bought this!
customer_reviews.author: midnightlives

customer_reviews.title: Okay for practice between classes.
customer_reviews.text: Good for practicing with my dog between classes. A little lightweight and the tie downs don't really hold it. I had to use tent stakes. I also put a cotton tarp down the middle so that my dog had a more substantial surface to run on. However, it works for non-competitive activities.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Very Well Made
customer_reviews.text: This tube is AKC approved and I can see why! It is very well made. My dogs love it when i set it up in the hallway....my son....not so much...lol
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for home training.
customer_reviews.text: Obviously this isn’t for professional use or for official agility courses but it’s great to get your dog used to the concept of the tunnel and indeed of curved tunnels too. Packs up well into the pouch. Great price.
customer_reviews.author: Martin Owen

customer_reviews.title: Looks like the dog will take a while to get it used to it.
customer_reviews.text: He is a nervous dog but I'm able to get him to go in after dog treats. He is intrigued. I would buy it again
customer_reviews.author: Becky Lynn Mueller

customer_reviews.title: Easy To Store and Lightweight
customer_reviews.text: My husband made our Cavalier his own agility playground to set up in our yard. Charlie *loves* it. This tunnel has held up very well, and is easy to store. Being that we are retired, the light weight is perfect.
customer_reviews.author: MarleneO

customer_reviews.title: I have two miniature Dachshunds and they don’t like this at all
customer_reviews.text: I have two miniature Dachshunds and they don’t like this at all. It’s very flimsy and makes a lot of noise when they run through it. I was very disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: Sheri

customer_reviews.title: An excellent company.
customer_reviews.text: The Dog Tunnel is well designed and a very serviceable unit, good value for the money. But the very best thing about the company is the humor of the posts - absolutely love it. It will brighten your day!
customer_reviews.author: tomsos

customer_reviews.title: Yes yes yes!
customer_reviews.text: I've been looking for a tunnel for my puppy for about a week now, and I've been iffy about a lot of them. I finally just went for it and bought this one. He's love it!!! It's reallly big but it's perfect in every way! He loves running through it and it's get him tired in about a half hour which is amazing. Totally recommend!!
customer_reviews.author: Sbarletta

customer_reviews.title: Fun for my little 8 lb dog.
customer_reviews.text: Nice material. Be sure to put the stick pins in at a angle as the wind will blow the tunnel around. My dog loves it.
customer_reviews.author: Redbirdfly

customer_reviews.title: Good agility tunnel!
customer_reviews.text: My dog does agility and this tunnel is great to use at home, so we can practice!
customer_reviews.author: Julie L Rein

customer_reviews.title: My dog loves it. He would t go through ...
customer_reviews.text: My dog loves it. He would t go through the tunnel at dog training, so we purchased this product, it’s a lot longer than we anticipated, but the dog loves it
customer_reviews.author: LC

customer_reviews.title: bad quality
customer_reviews.text: my dog ran through once and all of the holes where the stake goes through ripped right off the tunnel. cheap quality.
customer_reviews.author: Alex

customer_reviews.title: Our German Shepherd loves it!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this tunnel hoping to get our young German Shepherd something to play with. He immediately took to it, and runs through it like a shot every day. We didn't bother with the stakes after the first day; they were flimsy and not really necessary.
customer_reviews.author: GrannyGamer

customer_reviews.title: wonderful tunnel for the money.
customer_reviews.text: For the money this is a wonderful tunnel. I’m using it with my 20 pound dog. I’m able to fold it up by myself to put away.
customer_reviews.author: play doc

customer_reviews.title: Fun and functional
customer_reviews.text: This is a big hit with my two young beagle-hound mix dogs!! They tear through it during yard play time!! And sometimes just hang out in it!
customer_reviews.author: Jill Edison

customer_reviews.title: My dog wasn’t a fan
customer_reviews.text: I have to give this a meh rating because the dogs were afraid of it. I gave it to a friend who’s dog does obstacle courses instead.
customer_reviews.author: reading

customer_reviews.title: Dog loves his new play toy...
customer_reviews.text: Great product and my dog ( griff ) loves playing with it. Product was delivered as delivery date showed and as Described. Would highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Gavin Taylor

customer_reviews.title: My dogs LOVE it!
customer_reviews.text: This is my second one. The first one lasted a while. I buy heavy duty tent stakes to hold it down. The ones that come with it aren't very good at holding it down. The dogs love it and it gets a lot of use!
customer_reviews.author: Rere9

customer_reviews.title: Great product in handy storage and carrying bag.
customer_reviews.text: Very nice product in handy storage and carry all bag. My little Westie Lulu loves it. Great training aid! Sturdy enough for my little terriers. Havent tried it with my larger dogs as yet.
customer_reviews.author: Terry J. Kelly

customer_reviews.title: Playtime for my shih tzus
customer_reviews.text: I have 3 shih tzus...its a good size and big enough for me to crawl through with my babies..
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Bummer
customer_reviews.text: Sucks that it was discontinued my pit was looking forward to it
customer_reviews.author: Julie

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use and dogs love it!
customer_reviews.text: My dogs love it, right now they chase each other through it over and over, and I am working with them to integrate other agility items as part of their training. Good product!
customer_reviews.author: Dana L.

customer_reviews.title: This is a great product. Easy to setup
customer_reviews.text: This is a great product. Easy to setup, use and take down. My dog loves it. We use it both for a tunnel and a barrier. Many times we set this up in our great room to give our heeler some extra play time. He loves it. We used to set up chairs and now we can have the tunnel up in no time. Once he sees the tunnel coming out he goes crazy.
customer_reviews.author: Mark

customer_reviews.title: Nice product for the price
customer_reviews.text: This is surprisingly nice for the price - I was surprised. This would not be ideal for a dog that is too rough, but is perfect for my dog that is just learning agility.
customer_reviews.author: aleicoleman

customer_reviews.title: Dog tunnel to potty area.
customer_reviews.text: We set this up and trained our dog to run through it and now use it to have her exit the dog door and run through it to outside for her toilet. She loves it.
customer_reviews.author: Joan Arlin Hibbs

customer_reviews.title: Great value
customer_reviews.text: Great value! Just started agility training for our dog and this is a perfect addition. Great quality for at home use
customer_reviews.author: Kelli W

customer_reviews.title: Dont waste your money.
customer_reviews.text: Junk. 1 day all the eyelets broke out from tunnel. The stakes are weak also. Thought my daycare dogs would enjoy it but its a cheap product.
customer_reviews.author: tim willihnganz

customer_reviews.title: Becareful
customer_reviews.text: My 2 medium size dogs love tunnels. This tunnel plenty large enough. I had this one for 2 weeks and the wire came through on both ends. Very dissapointing. Thank goodness my dogs didn't get hurt.
customer_reviews.author: Patti

customer_reviews.title: Tunnel for Fun and Agility
customer_reviews.text: Our two puppies loved this!! Both are miniature dachshunds under 1 year. It was bigger than I thought and would work well for larger dogs too. Mine had a lot of room to run thru and play inside. When the weather gets warmer we will continue to use this outside as it is very long.
customer_reviews.author: Sharon Hoyt

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use.
customer_reviews.text: Only issue were the stakes...they are very slim and pull out of my sandy soil rather easily. I used some old tent stakes...works like a charm.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great product, and great carrying case
customer_reviews.text: Great product, and great carrying case. If I had one thing I wished to improve, the stakes could be heavier duty as they tend to not hold down the tunnel with wind.
customer_reviews.author: Alexandra Gant

customer_reviews.title: PItbull-Lab mix loves this tunnel
customer_reviews.text: We have left this tunnel open in our backyard and she runs through it frequently, even without being baited with a treat every time.
customer_reviews.author: Fitmedex

customer_reviews.title: Great dog toy
customer_reviews.text: Pup getting use to it, once she does she’ll run through it at high speeds.
customer_reviews.author: BARNEY

customer_reviews.title: ... puppy to keep him entertained - so far so good, he is already napping after having run through ...
customer_reviews.text: got this for our puppy to keep him entertained - so far so good, he is already napping after having run through it all afternoon
customer_reviews.author: Danielle A

customer_reviews.title: No regrets
customer_reviews.text: Great size for my miniature schnauzer agility. Easy to open and close. The zippered case is well made.
customer_reviews.author: Wendy

customer_reviews.title: Well made
customer_reviews.text: Well made item. Still can't get my dog to go through it.....although I've been in it lots tempting him....
customer_reviews.author: Bokworm

customer_reviews.title: Durable & fun
customer_reviews.text: My dog loves this. He goes through it, under it, and along side of it while chasing his ball and playing. It folds up easily and is good for both inside and out.
customer_reviews.author: KP

customer_reviews.title: The tunnel is easy to use as long as it is straight and ...
customer_reviews.text: The tunnel is easy to use as long as it is straight and the wind is not blowing. Putting a curve in the tunnel takes a bit of creative thinking and sand bags. The dogs do well with the fabric floor but if you have a hard driver the tunnel will flex significantly.
customer_reviews.author: Cobber Mom

customer_reviews.title: Great buy for backyard fun with your pet
customer_reviews.text: Bought the dog tunnel as a gift for my granddaughter. She loves it!! She has taught her 2 year old adopted puppy to run through the tunnel and is now using it with curves. Great buy for backyard fun with your pet. She is now wanting more agility training equipment.
customer_reviews.author: DDWhit

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Impressed with the quality. Much heavier fabric than I expected and very easier to fold back up.
customer_reviews.author: Tara

customer_reviews.title: Agility win!
customer_reviews.text: I love this tunnel! It is perfect for agility practice! It is great for medium size dogs. My Maltipoo loves it and we can get small training sessions in before work. It is easy to store and take with us for proofing her skills in a new location. I am so glad I bought it!
customer_reviews.author: Taylor

customer_reviews.title: Good price, cheap fabric
customer_reviews.text: This would be a great product if the fabric holding down the stakes was sewn on better/stronger. Almost all of them tore off after the first windy day, which happened to be within the first week. I can still set it up and use it, but that was a bit of a let down.
customer_reviews.author: Jim H.

customer_reviews.title: Worth the money!
customer_reviews.text: Great tunnel. It's great for my energetic border collie. Might be a little thin for someone who is using it for a show.
customer_reviews.author: Martha P

customer_reviews.title: Nice for the price.
customer_reviews.text: Nice tunnel for the price, but flimsy. I hope it will last a year.
customer_reviews.author: BE Kaye

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for training!
customer_reviews.text: We had the short tunnel but needed to get Jack used to a tunnel with a curve. This one is perfect! Long enough to curve. And I fit in it. An added bonus. lol
customer_reviews.author: Monica Jorgensen

customer_reviews.title: Great little dog tunnel!
customer_reviews.text: My dog loves this little tunnel. It is easy to pop up and collapse, and fits perfectly into its little carrying bag. Great bargain!
customer_reviews.author: J.D.

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Very durable and is perfect for active dogs! Indoor and outdoor use which is amazing!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Dogs loved it!
customer_reviews.text: Good quality and easy to store. My dogs love it they even will nap in it!
customer_reviews.author: John L

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: My puppies loved to play in and around this....very happy with this item.....easy to store!!
customer_reviews.author: julie

customer_reviews.title: Highly recommend this 👍🏼
customer_reviews.text: My dogs LOVE IT!!!! Love the case too. From my large Lab to my corgi 🎉🎉🎉
customer_reviews.author: Dawn B

customer_reviews.title: great Value
customer_reviews.text: this is a great tube it's got plenty of room and the dogs love it . It;s light and and easy to set up and fold up. I love it
customer_reviews.author: christine

customer_reviews.title: Good Purchase
customer_reviews.text: Fun product for both us and our pups. Helps promote exercise mental and physical.
customer_reviews.author: Matrixx

customer_reviews.title: Great exercise and durable for my puppy.
customer_reviews.text: My Havanese puppy loves to play in and out of the tunnel. Also my 16 and18 year old granddaughters. Great for play indoors in wet and cold weather.
customer_reviews.author: Judy Nissila

customer_reviews.title: It was a real hit!
customer_reviews.text: It was a real hit! The dog figured it out very quickly and everyone had a good time inventing ways to get her to go through it. Seems to be well made. It was easy to get back into the case. We look forward to many months of fun with the tunnel.
customer_reviews.author: John

customer_reviews.title: Tunnel is easy to set up and take down
customer_reviews.text: Tunnel is easy to set up and take down, but one of the anchor tabs nearly ripped loose after the first time I set it up. No, I did not put undue stain on the tab. It just ripped away. I can still use it though and will try to repair/replace the tab.
customer_reviews.author: David Rodabaugh

customer_reviews.title: Backyard Agility on the Cheap!
customer_reviews.text: Awesome piece of gear for a small price. Great quality. Impressed.
customer_reviews.author: Jessica DePriest

customer_reviews.title: Super portable.
customer_reviews.text: Easy to set-up and take down. Seems to be well made and durable.
customer_reviews.author: Amy

customer_reviews.title: Lightweight and easy to transport
customer_reviews.text: My lab mix loves the tunnel! Lightweight and easy to transport.
customer_reviews.author: TSK

customer_reviews.title: Cheap thread
customer_reviews.text: We have had the product a little over a month and the sewing in coming apart at the seams which hold the wire in place.... Cheap thread.
customer_reviews.author: Chris Kleser

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: My dog and her neighbor dog friend love this so much.
customer_reviews.author: A Will

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: Perfect for home training and practice. Light weight and easy storage!
customer_reviews.author: GARY G.

customer_reviews.title: Not happy with this product
customer_reviews.text: Not happy with this product,was going to use for dog training and wanted the product to be able to open part way helping dogs with anxiety, It is only good fully expanded
customer_reviews.author: Greg Foster

customer_reviews.title: Great!!
customer_reviews.text: My dogs love it! It is very easy to use and put away.
customer_reviews.author: Jason Proctor

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for backyard agility
customer_reviews.text: Perfect for backyard agility. Materials are very thin. Best to put it away out of the elements when not using.
customer_reviews.author: Bernie

customer_reviews.title: Excellent,inexpensive tunnel!
customer_reviews.text: For the money and easy to set up and put away,you cannot beat it.
customer_reviews.author: noschmo

customer_reviews.title: So-So
customer_reviews.text: Neat item but not super high quality and doesn’t seem to be too exciting for our Jack Russell-mix. A bit expensive for what it is. Doesn’t retain its shape very well.
customer_reviews.author: Matt D., NYC

customer_reviews.title: Lots of fun for her to run through
customer_reviews.text: Puppy loves it. Lots of fun for her to run through.
customer_reviews.author: KIki

customer_reviews.title: Tunnel carry case
customer_reviews.text: Tunnel seems to be fine but the carry case is ripped along seems and zipper is sewn and not supposed to be.
customer_reviews.author: Rgordon

customer_reviews.title: Great for Home Agility Course!
customer_reviews.text: My dog is still in the "intro" level of agility, but I bought this for practice at home in tunnel work. It is more than adequate for occasional practice use and holds up well (so far) as my husky tears though it at breakneck speed! Loss of one star since the included stakes for holding it steady were NOT included in my shipment... easily remedied in the Home Depot gardening department! I must say, Houseables followup e-mail is the most charming and original marking tool I've ever seen!
customer_reviews.author: Merrie C. Ligon

product_meta.title: Houseables Dog Tunnel, Agility Equipment, 18 Ft Long, 24" Open, Polyester, Play Tunnels for Training Small & Medium Dogs, Park Playground Toy, Large Obstacle Course for Pets, with Carrying Case
feature_bullets: REGULATION SIZE: Regulation size (18' long coiled shape shifting tube with 24” double-ended openings -- AKC and NADAC compliant) agility tunnel modeled after those found in obstacle courses at sanctioned dog events. Recommended for small to mid-sized dogs weighing up to 80-90 pounds (casual use only).

DURABLE MATERIAL: Lined with a blue covering made from lightweight yet surprisingly durable 600D woven Oxford Dacron. Included in this set are 8-10 anti-rust zinc plated 7” stakes that insert through the metal grommet tabs around the base of the tunnel. The downward angled tops of the stakes will not protrude out of the ground and cause harm to your dogs while they play.

ENDLESS EXERCISE: A tremendous resource for sharpening your dog’s obedience, quickness, dexterity, and overall quality of life. Use this dynamic, portable tunnel for casual play, exercise, and introductory training. It is perfect for burning tons of dog energy, playing chase, fetch, hide-and-seek, and a great many other dog/owner favorites.

PORTABLE: Arrives in a circular carrying case with dual nylon black handles at the top for effortless transport. Once removed from the case, the tunnel instantly expands to full length like a pop out tent. Quickly collapses and folds back together when you are finished. Set it up inside the home, in the backyard, at your favorite beach or park, and much more.

EASY FUN AFTER A RUFF DAY: Sometimes dogging is ruff, and a pup just needs to run around to shed some stress. Our tunnel is a quick and easy way to make an obstacle course of fun for your dog to play with. Your puppy will love it, we guarantee it!
